name: accordion
description: A vertically stacked set of interactive headings

files.content:
<script setup lang="ts">
import { AccordionRoot, type AccordionRootProps } from 'reka-ui'

const props = defineProps<AccordionRootProps>()
</script>

<template>
  <AccordionRoot v-bind="props">
    <slot />
  </AccordionRoot>
</template>

<script setup lang="ts">
import { AccordionItem as AccordionItemPrimitive, type AccordionItemProps } from 'reka-ui'
import { cn } from '@/lib/utils'

interface Props extends AccordionItemProps {
  class?: string
}

const props = defineProps<Props>()
</script>

<template>
  <AccordionItemPrimitive
    v-bind="props"
    :class="
      cn(
        'border-3 border-foreground border-b-0 last:border-b-3 shadow-[4px_4px_0px_hsl(var(--shadow-color))]',
        props.class
      )
    "
  >
    <slot />
  </AccordionItemPrimitive>
</template>

<script setup lang="ts">
import { AccordionHeader, AccordionTrigger as AccordionTriggerPrimitive } from 'reka-ui'
import { ChevronDown } from 'lucide-vue-next'
import { cn } from '@/lib/utils'

defineProps<{
  class?: string
}>()
</script>

<template>
  <AccordionHeader class="flex">
    <AccordionTriggerPrimitive
      :class="
        cn(
          'flex flex-1 items-center justify-between bg-background py-4 px-4 font-bold uppercase tracking-wide transition-all duration-200 hover:bg-muted [&[data-state=open]]:bg-accent [&[data-state=open]>svg]:rotate-180',
          $props.class
        )
      "
    >
      <slot />
      <ChevronDown class="h-5 w-5 shrink-0 stroke-[3] transition-transform duration-200" />
    </AccordionTriggerPrimitive>
  </AccordionHeader>
</template>
